Recap: Danny takes off in his plane to save Michelle but has engine problems. He calls Marina and Tony and tells Tony that he left a message for Tony to play to Robbie when he thinks the time is right. While Michelle wrestles with Sebastian, they hear a plane go down. Sebastian tests Holly by telling her where a gun is and for her to give it to him. She tries to shot him instead and is horrified to learn that the gun isn't loaded. Dinah and Cassie both try on wedding dresses at the same boutique. Cassie tells Edmund that she is going to stay at the Beacon until the ceremony. Reva finds out that Jonathan burned down his parents house, but still covers for him when Jeffrey tries to question him.
Transcript: Dinah: Where you going? I thought we had a breakfast date?
Jeffrey: Yeah, well you're late.
Dinah: The alarm didn't go off. I got here as quickly as I could. Although I think I have a natural glow, what do you think?
Jeffrey: You're not going to start with this, are you?
Dinah: I thought we could pick out baby names. What do you think, Daddy?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Edmund: I'm sensing you're not enjoying this walk as much as I am.
Cassie: I just want to be working on our project.
Edmund: Our project?
Cassie: Baby Winslow.
Edmund: Ooh. We'll set aside a certain amount of time for that project later on.
Cassie: Why don't we do it now.
Edmund: Now?
Cassie: Yeah. You can throw down your coat like what's his name?
Edmund: Sir Walter Raleigh, but I think he was trying to be a gentleman.
Cassie: Gentlemen are overrated.
Edmund: Oh, good for you.
Cassie: I forgot.
Edmund: What?
Cassie: I have a dress appointment.
Edmund: All right. All right. Wait, wait, I'll drive you.
Cassie: No... oh, okay. You can drive me but you can't come in, okay, because that's a no-no.
Edmund: Since when did you get superstitious?
Cassie: Since Dinah and my sister's bad seed is walking around town. I'm not taking any chances.

Jonathan: What's the occasion, Mom?
Reva: It's a party for Cassie.
Jonathan: Sounds like fun.
Reva: Women only.
Jonathan: Even better.
Reva: You weren't invited.

Sebastian: Did you really think that I could trust you, Holly? That I would place my life in your hands?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Marina: Danny, you can make it. I know you can.
Danny: I sure as hell am going to try, but....
Marina: There's got to be something that you can do.

Danny: Thanks for everything, Marina. I really appreciate that you came down here with me. Do me a favor and look after Robbie, will you? I've really enjoyed getting to know you. I think you're great and you're going to do something really terrific with your life. I've got no doubt about that.
Marina: Danny, this isn't good-bye.
Danny: No?
Marina: No. No, because I won't say it. How about see ya later?
Danny: Okay. I'll see ya later, Marina. Put Tony on the phone, will you?
Tony: Yeah?
Danny: Looks like I got myself into trouble here, cousin.
Tony: You should have brought me with you, Danny.
Danny: It's a good thing I didn't. Listen, you've got to find Ed now. There are a bunch of names in my bag, names that I used the last time to find him.
Tony: All right.
Danny: And I left a message on your machine at home for Robbie. I trust you to know when the time is right to play it for him.
Tony: Danny, look, about me and Michelle, I just....
Danny: Forget it, Tony. It's okay. It's okay. I've got to go. Save our girl.
Tony: Danny? Danny?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Next, on "Guiding Light"...
Frank: Harley confronted Phillip that night.
Gus: They had a little argument and it got a little bit ugly.
Frank: Dad, we have blood evidence linking Harley to the shooting.
Buzz: Oh, God.
Tammy: You haven't gotten rid of Sandy forever. He's my date for your wedding.
Cassie: Tammy...
Tammy: Unless you want know find someone else. It's not too late to find a replacement. I know. How about JB?
